trans-unit.source: Manages ASP.NET Ajax script libraries and script files, partial-page rendering, and client proxy class generation for Web and application services.
trans-unit.target: 管理 Web 與應用程式服務的 ASP.NET Ajax 指令碼程式庫和指令碼檔、局部網頁呈現及用戶端 Proxy 類別產生。

trans-unit.target: 本主題內容：

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 簡介

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control is central to Ajax functionality in ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項是在 ASP.NET Ajax 功能的核心。

trans-unit.source: The control manages all ASP.NET Ajax resources on a page.
trans-unit.target: 控制管理頁面上的所有 ASP.NET Ajax 資源。

trans-unit.source: This includes downloading [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] scripts to the browser and coordinating partial-page updates that are enabled by using <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls.
trans-unit.target: 這包括下載[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]瀏覽器及協調使用啟用的部分頁面更新指令碼<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control enables you to do the following:
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項可讓您執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Register script that is compatible with partial-page updates.
trans-unit.target: 註冊局部網頁更新與相容的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: In order to manage dependencies between your script and the core library, any script that you register is loaded after the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] script.
trans-unit.target: 若要管理您的指令碼與核心程式庫之間的相依性之後, 載入您註冊的任何指令碼[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Specify whether release or debug scripts are sent to the browser.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否釋放或偵錯指令碼會傳送至瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: Provide access to Web service methods from script by registering Web services with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 註冊 Web 服務的 Web 服務方法來提供存取從指令碼<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Provide access to ASP.NET authentication, role, and profile application services from client script by registering these services with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供的註冊這些服務與 ASP.NET 驗證、 角色和設定檔的存取用戶端指令碼的應用程式服務<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Enable culture-specific display of ECMAScript (JavaScript) , , and functions in the browser.
trans-unit.target: 啟用特定文化特性和顯示的 ECMAScript (JavaScript)、 瀏覽器中的函式。

trans-unit.source: Access localization resources for embedded script files or for stand-alone script files by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ResourceUICultures%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用存取當地語系化資源內嵌指令碼檔案或獨立的指令碼檔案<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ResourceUICultures%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Register server controls that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl> or <xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> interfaces with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control so that script required by client components and behaviors is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 註冊伺服器控制項的實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl>或<xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl>介面<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項，以便在呈現用戶端元件和行為所需的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Partial-Page Rendering
trans-unit.target: 在局部網頁呈現

trans-unit.source: The ability of an ASP.NET page to support partial-page rendering is controlled by the following factors:
trans-unit.target: 支援局部網頁呈現 ASP.NET 網頁的能力受到下列因素：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering%2A> property must be `true` (the default value).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering%2A>屬性必須是`true`（預設值）。

trans-unit.source: There must be at least one <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 必須有至少一個<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>頁面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A> property must be `true` (the default value).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A>屬性必須是`true`（預設值）。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A> property is not set explicitly, its value is based on browser capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A>屬性未明確設定，其值會根據瀏覽器功能。

trans-unit.source: You can override the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering%2A> property at run time during or before the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫的值<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering%2A>屬性在執行階段期間或之前的頁面<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>事件。

trans-unit.source: If you try to change this property after the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event has occurred, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試變更這個屬性頁之後<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>已發生事件，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When partial-page rendering is supported, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control renders script to enable asynchronous postbacks and partial-page updates.
trans-unit.target: 支援局部網頁呈現時，<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項呈現的指令碼來啟用非同步回傳及部分頁面更新。

trans-unit.source: The regions of the page to be updated are designated by using <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的頁面，即可更新區域<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control handles the asynchronous postbacks and refreshes only the regions of the page that have to be updated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制處理非同步回傳，並重新整理只網頁的區域，必須更新。

trans-unit.source: For more information about partial-page rendering, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關局部網頁呈現的詳細資訊，請參閱[局部網頁呈現概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the conditions that cause an update, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a).
trans-unit.target: 多個條件，讓更新的詳細資訊，請參閱[UpdatePanel 控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)。

trans-unit.source: Using the ScriptManager Control with Master Pages, User Controls, and Other Child Components
trans-unit.target: ScriptManager 控制項使用主版頁面、 使用者控制項和其他子元件

trans-unit.source: A page can contain only one <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control in its hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 分頁只能包含一個<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>其階層架構中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: To register services and scripts for nested pages, user controls, or components when the parent page already has a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊服務與巢狀的頁面、 使用者控制項或元件的指令碼時已有父系分頁<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the UpdatePanel Control with Master Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b1c974d5-a6b2-4bb3-a3cc-61dd9dc0e1d6)
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[UpdatePanel 控制項使用主版頁面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b1c974d5-a6b2-4bb3-a3cc-61dd9dc0e1d6)

trans-unit.source: Script Management and Registration
trans-unit.target: 指令碼管理和註冊

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control enables you to register script that is then rendered as part of the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項可讓您註冊指令碼，接著會轉譯為頁面的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control registration methods can be broken into the following three categories:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項註冊方法可分成下列三個類別：

trans-unit.source: Registration methods that guarantee that script dependencies on the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] are maintained.
trans-unit.target: 保證的註冊方法上的指令碼相依性[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]進行維護。

trans-unit.source: Registration methods that are not dependent on the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)], but that are compatible with <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls.
trans-unit.target: 不是依存於的註冊方法[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]，但該相容<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Registration methods that support working with <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls.
trans-unit.target: 註冊方法支援使用<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to create and use Ajax script in ASP.NET, see [Creating Custom Client Script by Using the Microsoft Ajax Library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/285e3a65-b42e-42c5-952d-baf184057899).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何建立和使用 ASP.NET Ajax 指令碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[建立自訂用戶端指令碼使用 Microsoft Ajax Library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/285e3a65-b42e-42c5-952d-baf184057899)。

trans-unit.source: Registering Script That Is Dependent on the Microsoft Ajax Library
trans-unit.target: 註冊相依於 Microsoft Ajax 程式庫的指令碼

trans-unit.source: You can use the following methods to register script files in a way that guarantees that any dependencies on the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] are maintained.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用下列方法可確保任何相依項目上的方式註冊指令碼檔案[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]進行維護。

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: 方法

trans-unit.source: Definition
trans-unit.target: 定義

trans-unit.source: Registers a server control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> interface that is used to define a client object.
trans-unit.target: 註冊的伺服器控制項，實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl>用來定義用戶端物件的介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control renders script that supports the client object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項呈現支援用戶端物件的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Registers a server control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl> interface that is used to define a client object.
trans-unit.target: 註冊的伺服器控制項，實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl>用來定義用戶端物件的介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control renders script that supports the client object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項呈現支援用戶端物件的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Registering Partial-Page Update Compatible Scripts
trans-unit.target: 註冊部分頁面更新相容的指令碼

trans-unit.source: You can use the following methods to register script files that are not dependent on the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] but that are compatible with <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用下列方法來註冊指令碼檔案不是依存於[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]相容，但<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: These methods correspond to similar methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法會對應至類似方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you are rendering script for use inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control, make sure that you call the methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您轉譯指令碼內使用的<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制，請確定您呼叫的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: 方法

trans-unit.source: Definition
trans-unit.target: 定義

trans-unit.source: Adds a value to a JavaScript array.
trans-unit.target: 將值加入至 JavaScript 陣列。

trans-unit.source: If the array does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果陣列不存在，則會建立它。

trans-unit.source: Renders a `script` element after the page's opening `<form>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 呈現`script`元素在頁面開啟之後`<form>`標記。

trans-unit.source: The script is specified as a string parameter.
trans-unit.target: 指定指令碼作為字串參數。

trans-unit.source: Renders a `script` element after the page's opening `<form>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 呈現`script`元素在頁面開啟之後`<form>`標記。

trans-unit.source: The script content is specified by setting the `src` attribute to a URL that points to a script file.
trans-unit.target: 設定來指定指令碼內容`src`屬性設定為指向指令碼檔案的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Renders a `script` element after the page's opening `<form>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 呈現`script`元素在頁面開啟之後`<form>`標記。

trans-unit.source: The script content is specified with a resource name in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼內容指定的組件中的資源名稱。

trans-unit.source: The `src` attribute is automatically populated with a URL by a call to an HTTP handler that retrieves the named script from the assembly.
trans-unit.target: `src`屬性會自動填入 URL 從組件中擷取的已命名的指令碼為 HTTP 處理常式呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Renders a custom name/value attribute pair (an expando) in the markup for a specified control.
trans-unit.target: 呈現指定控制項的標記中的自訂名稱/值屬性組 (expando)。

trans-unit.source: Renders a hidden field.
trans-unit.target: 會呈現隱藏的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Registers a script that is executed in response to the `form` element's `submit` event.
trans-unit.target: 註冊會在回應中執行指令碼`form`項目的`submit`事件。

trans-unit.source: The `onSubmit` attribute references the specified script.
trans-unit.target: `onSubmit`屬性將會參考指定的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Renders a startup script block just before the page's closing `</form>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 呈現頁面的右之前啟動指令碼區塊`</form>`標記。

trans-unit.source: The script to render is specified as a string parameter.
trans-unit.target: 要轉譯的指令碼已指定為字串參數。

trans-unit.source: When you register methods, you specify a type/key pair for that script.
trans-unit.target: 當您註冊方法時，您會指定該指令碼的類型/金鑰組。

trans-unit.source: If a script with the same type/key pair is already registered, a new script is not registered.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未註冊具有相同的型別/金鑰組的指令碼，新的指令碼未註冊。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if you register a script with a type/resource name pair that already exists, the `script` element that references the resource is not added again.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，如果您註冊的指令碼的資源類型/名稱組已經存在，則`script`參考該資源的項目不會加入一次。

trans-unit.source: When you register an expando attribute of a previously registered attribute, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 當您註冊 expando 屬性的先前註冊的屬性時，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate registration of array values is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 允許的陣列值的重複註冊。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptInclude%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptResource%2A> method, avoid registering script that executes inline functions.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptInclude%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptResource%2A>方法，避免註冊執行內嵌函式的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Instead, register script that contains function definitions like event handlers or custom class definitions for your application.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，註冊指令碼，其中包含如事件處理常式的函式定義或自訂類別定義，應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Registration Methods for UpdatePanel Controls
trans-unit.target: UpdatePanel 控制項的註冊方法

trans-unit.source: You can use the following methods to customize partial-page updates when you use <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用下列方法，當您使用自訂部分頁面更新<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: 方法

trans-unit.source: Definition
trans-unit.target: 定義

trans-unit.source: Registers a control as a trigger for asynchronous postbacks.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項註冊為非同步回傳的觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: Sends custom data to controls during partial-page rendering.
trans-unit.target: 在局部網頁呈現期間，將自訂資料傳送給控制項。

trans-unit.source: Registers a dispose script for a control that is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 註冊控制項內部的 dispose 指令碼<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The script is executed when the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control is updated or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 更新或刪除 <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> 控制項時，即會執行該指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The dispose method is used for client components that are part of the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] and that have to free resources when a component is no longer used.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法用於用戶端元件屬於[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]且無法再使用元件時，釋放資源。

trans-unit.source: Registers a control as a trigger for a full postback.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項註冊完整頁面的回傳的觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: This method is used for controls inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control that would otherwise perform asynchronous postbacks.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>另外執行非同步回傳的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Web Service References
trans-unit.target: Web 服務參考

trans-unit.source: You can register a Web service to be called from client script by creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference> object and adding it to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Services%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以註冊 Web 服務呼叫從用戶端指令碼，藉由建立<xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference>物件並將它加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Services%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET generates a client proxy object for each <xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Services%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會為每個產生的用戶端 proxy 物件<xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Services%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically add <xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference> objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Services%2A> collection to register Web services at run time.
trans-unit.target: 您可以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.ServiceReference>物件加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Services%2A>在執行階段註冊 Web 服務的集合。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to access Web services in script, see [Exposing Web Services to Client Script in ASP.NET AJAX](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f6e9e-0acd-44c9-bf0f-0a8598fc13b8) and [Calling Web Services from Client Script in ASP.NET AJAX](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc06c224-f01a-45be-94af-bd71afbc07b0).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何存取指令碼中的 Web 服務的詳細資訊，請參閱[公開 Web 服務與 ASP.NET AJAX 中的用戶端指令碼](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f6e9e-0acd-44c9-bf0f-0a8598fc13b8)和[從 ASP.NET AJAX 中的用戶端指令碼呼叫 Web 服務](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc06c224-f01a-45be-94af-bd71afbc07b0)。

trans-unit.source: Localization
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control generates references in the rendered page that point to the appropriate localized script files, which are either script files embedded in assemblies or stand-alone script files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項產生參考在呈現的頁面指向適當的當地語系化指令碼檔案，也就是其中一個內嵌於組件或獨立的指令碼檔案中的指令碼檔案。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptLocalization%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control retrieves localized resources (such as localized strings) for the current culture, if they exist.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptLocalization%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項擷取目前的文化特性的當地語系化的資源 （例如當地語系化的字串），如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control provides the following functionality for using localized resources:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項提供下列功能，以使用當地語系化的資源：

trans-unit.source: **Script files that are embedded in an assembly**.
trans-unit.target: **指令碼會內嵌在組件的檔案**。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control determines which culture-specific or fallback-culture script file to send to the browser.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項會決定將傳送至瀏覽器的文化特性或後援文化特性的指令碼檔案。

trans-unit.source: It does this by using the culture-specific <xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute> assembly attribute, the resources packaged with the assembly, and the UI culture of the browser (if any).
trans-unit.target: 其做法是使用特定文化特性<xref:System.Resources.NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute>組件的屬性、 封裝與組件和 UI 文化特性的瀏覽器 （如果有的話） 的資源。

trans-unit.source: **Stand-alone script files**.
trans-unit.target: **獨立的指令碼檔案**。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control defines the list of UI cultures that are supported by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ResourceUICultures%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項定義的使用支援的 UI 文化特性清單<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ResourceUICultures%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>物件。

trans-unit.source: **In debug mode**.
trans-unit.target: **在偵錯模式**。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control tries to render a culture-specific script file that contains debug information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項嘗試呈現特定文化特性的指令碼檔案包含偵錯資訊。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the page is in debug mode and the current culture is set to en-MX, the control renders a script file that has a name such as `scriptname`.en-MX.debug.js, if the file exists.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果頁面是在偵錯模式中，目前的文化特性設定為 en-us MX 控制項呈現的指令碼檔案，例如其名稱`scriptname`.en-MX.debug.js，如果檔案存在。

trans-unit.source: If the file does not exist, the debug file for the appropriate fallback culture is rendered
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案不存在，則會呈現適當的後援文化特性的偵錯檔案

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to localize resources, see [Localizing Resources for Component Libraries Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e6b15435-57c1-4dd1-9bd3-5d4c509685bb).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何當地語系化資源的詳細資訊，請參閱[當地語系化資源元件程式庫概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e6b15435-57c1-4dd1-9bd3-5d4c509685bb)。

trans-unit.source: Error Handling
trans-unit.target: 錯誤處理

trans-unit.source: When a page error occurs during asynchronous postbacks, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 在非同步回傳期間發生頁面錯誤時<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The way in which errors on the server are sent to the client depends on the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A> property, and the custom errors section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 在該伺服器上的錯誤會傳送至用戶端的方式取決於<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A>屬性，並在 Web.config 檔案的自訂錯誤區段。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Customizing Error Handling for UpdatePanel Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e15e7ffb-e4b2-4a89-b99e-16624a5861d0).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[UpdatePanel 控制項的自訂錯誤處理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e15e7ffb-e4b2-4a89-b99e-16624a5861d0)。

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 宣告式語法

trans-unit.source: The following examples show different scenarios for using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示不同的方案使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項。

trans-unit.source: **Enabling Partial-Page Updates**
trans-unit.target: **啟用局部網頁更新**

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control to enable partial-page updates.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>啟用局部網頁更新控制項。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control are inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控制項位於<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: By default, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelUpdateMode.Always>, and the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，值<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelUpdateMode.Always>，和值<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, child controls of the panel cause an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: 因此，子控制項的面板會導致在非同步回傳。

trans-unit.source: **Handling Partial-Page Update Errors and Registering Script**
trans-unit.target: **處理部分頁面更新錯誤，並註冊指令碼**

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to provide custom error handling during partial-page updates.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何提供自訂錯誤處理部分頁面更新期間。

trans-unit.source: By default, when an error occurs during partial-page updates, a JavaScript message box is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，在局部網頁更新期間發生錯誤時就會顯示 JavaScript 訊息方塊。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates how to use custom error handling by providing a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError> event, and by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A> property in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何使用自訂錯誤處理所提供的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError>事件，以及設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A>事件處理常式中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A> property to specify how the custom errors section of the Web.config file is used when an error occurs during partial-page updates.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A>屬性來指定在局部網頁更新期間發生錯誤時，如何使用 Web.config 檔案的自訂錯誤區段。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the default value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，預設值的<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A>屬性使用。

trans-unit.source: This means that if the Web.config file contains a element, that element determines how errors are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，如果 Web.config 檔案包含的項目，該項目會決定顯示錯誤的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [customErrors Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/288c32e2-df1f-4548-abda-de6b4cb989a6).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[customErrors 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/288c32e2-df1f-4548-abda-de6b4cb989a6)。

trans-unit.source: **Globalizing the Date and Time That Are Displayed in the Browser**
trans-unit.target: **全球化的日期和時間，會顯示在瀏覽器**

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptGlobalization%2A> property so that client script can display a culture-specific date and time in the browser.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptGlobalization%2A>屬性，因此，該用戶端指令碼會在瀏覽器中顯示的特定文化特性的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: In the example, the `Culture` attribute of the directive is set to `auto`.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，`Culture`指示詞屬性設為`auto`。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the first language that is specified in the current browser settings determines the culture and UI culture for the page.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，目前的瀏覽器設定中指定的第一個語言會決定的文化特性和 UI 文化特性的頁面。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Set the Culture and UI Culture for ASP.NET Web Page Globalization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76091f86-f967-4687-a40f-de87bd8cc9a0).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 設定 ASP.NET Web 網頁全球化的文化特性和 UI 文化特性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76091f86-f967-4687-a40f-de87bd8cc9a0)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the internal fields that are used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control to track page, control, and deployment information.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會初始化所使用的內部欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>追蹤頁面、 控制和部署資訊的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Creates a history point and adds it to the browser's history stack.
trans-unit.target: 建立記錄點，並將其加入瀏覽器的記錄堆疊。

trans-unit.source: These method overloads enable you to define server state, and optionally the title of the history entry in the browser.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法多載可讓您定義 瀏覽器中的 伺服器狀態，以及 （選擇性） 之記錄項目的標題。

trans-unit.source: When you create a history point, serialized and encrypted data is appended to the URL of the Web page and an entry is included in the browser's history stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立記錄點時，序列化和加密的資料會附加至網頁的 URL 和項目包含在瀏覽器的記錄堆疊。

trans-unit.source: You can use the state data to re-create the page when any subsequent server navigation event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 重新建立頁面時，會引發任何後續伺服器瀏覽事件，您可以使用的狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Managing Browser History Using Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bad617c8-f84c-4d94-8852-60af400810e9).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[管理的瀏覽器歷程記錄使用伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bad617c8-f84c-4d94-8852-60af400810e9)。

trans-unit.source: A collection of key/value pairs that contain the data for the state.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵/值組集合，內含該狀態的資料。

trans-unit.source: The text that will be added to the browser's history stack as the title for this state.
trans-unit.target: 文字，這段文字將加入瀏覽器記錄堆疊做為此狀態的標題。

trans-unit.source: Creates a history point and adds it to the browser's history stack, using the specified state data collection and state title.
trans-unit.target: 透過使用指定的狀態資料集合和狀態標題，進行建立記錄點，並將其加入瀏覽器的記錄堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a history point when you want to save more than one key/value pair for the state data.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來建立記錄點，當您想要儲存的狀態資料的多個索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: When you create a history point, serialized and encrypted data is appended to the URL of the Web page and an entry is included in the browser's history stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立記錄點時，序列化和加密的資料會附加至網頁的 URL 和項目包含在瀏覽器的記錄堆疊。

trans-unit.source: If the `title` parameter is `null`, the title of the Web page is used as the title of the state entry in the history stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果`title`參數是`null`，為狀態中的項目記錄堆疊的標題會使用網頁的標題。

trans-unit.source: You can use the state data to re-create the page when any subsequent server navigation event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 重新建立頁面時，會引發任何後續伺服器瀏覽事件，您可以使用的狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Managing Browser History Using Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bad617c8-f84c-4d94-8852-60af400810e9).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[管理的瀏覽器歷程記錄使用伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bad617c8-f84c-4d94-8852-60af400810e9)。

trans-unit.source: The key part of the key/value pair that identifies the state of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 可識別網頁狀態之索引鍵/值組的索引鍵部分。

trans-unit.source: The value part of the key/value pair that identifies the state of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 可識別網頁狀態之索引鍵/值組的值部分。

trans-unit.source: Creates a history point and adds it to the browser's history stack, using the specified state key and state value.
trans-unit.target: 透過使用指定的狀態索引鍵和狀態值，進行建立記錄點，並將其加入瀏覽器的記錄堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a history point when you only want to save a value to identify the state.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立記錄點，只想要儲存的值來識別狀態時使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a history point, serialized and encrypted data is appended to the URL of the Web page and an entry is included in the browser's history stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立記錄點時，序列化和加密的資料會附加至網頁的 URL 和項目包含在瀏覽器的記錄堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The title of the Web page is used as the title of the state entry in the history stack.
trans-unit.target: 為標題的記錄堆疊中的狀態項目會使用網頁的標題。

trans-unit.source: You can use the state data to re-create the page when any subsequent server navigation event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 重新建立頁面時，會引發任何後續伺服器瀏覽事件，您可以使用的狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Managing Browser History Using Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bad617c8-f84c-4d94-8852-60af400810e9).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[管理的瀏覽器歷程記錄使用伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bad617c8-f84c-4d94-8852-60af400810e9)。

trans-unit.source: The key part of the key/value pair that identifies the state of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 可識別網頁狀態之索引鍵/值組的索引鍵部分。

trans-unit.source: The value part of the key/value pair that identifies the state of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 可識別網頁狀態之索引鍵/值組的值部分。

trans-unit.source: The text that will be added to the browser's history stack as the title for this state.
trans-unit.target: 文字，這段文字將加入瀏覽器記錄堆疊做為此狀態的標題。

trans-unit.source: Creates a history point and adds it to the browser's history stack, using the specified state key, state value, and state title.
trans-unit.target: 透過使用指定的狀態索引鍵、狀態值和狀態標題，進行建立記錄點，並將其加入瀏覽器的記錄堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a history point when you want to save a value to identify the state and a title for the state.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立記錄點，當您想要儲存的值來識別的狀態和狀態標題中使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a history point, serialized and encrypted data is appended to the URL of the Web page and an entry is included in the browser's history stack.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立記錄點時，序列化和加密的資料會附加至網頁的 URL 和項目包含在瀏覽器的記錄堆疊。

trans-unit.source: If the `title` parameter is `null`, the title of the Web page is used as the title of the state entry in the history stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果`title`參數是`null`，為狀態中的項目記錄堆疊的標題會使用網頁的標題。

trans-unit.source: You can use the state data to re-create the page when any subsequent server navigation event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 重新建立頁面時，會引發任何後續伺服器瀏覽事件，您可以使用的狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Managing Browser History Using Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bad617c8-f84c-4d94-8852-60af400810e9).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[管理的瀏覽器歷程記錄使用伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bad617c8-f84c-4d94-8852-60af400810e9)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Ajax framework assembly that components on the page use.
trans-unit.target: 取得網頁上元件所使用的 Ajax 架構組件。

trans-unit.source: The Ajax framework assembly.
trans-unit.target: Ajax 架構組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how client scripts of the Microsoft Ajax client library will be included on the client.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，該值指出如何將 Microsoft Ajax 用戶端程式庫的用戶端指令碼包含在用戶端中。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.AjaxFrameworkMode" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.AjaxFrameworkMode" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AjaxFrameworkMode%2A> property to enable all Microsoft Ajax script files, to disable all Microsoft Ajax script files, or to explicitly include individual script files.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AjaxFrameworkMode%2A>屬性，讓所有 Microsoft Ajax 指令碼檔案，以停用所有的 Microsoft Ajax 指令碼檔案，或明確包含個別的指令碼檔案。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AjaxFrameworkMode%2A> property to `Explicit` in order to indicate that scripts can be explicitly specified.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AjaxFrameworkMode%2A>屬性`Explicit`以指出可以明確指定指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the custom errors section of the Web.config file is used during an error in an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，該值決定是否在非同步回傳期間使用 Web.config 檔案的自訂錯誤區段。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the custom errors setting in the Web.config file is used to determine error behavior during asynchronous postbacks; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 Web.config 檔案中的自訂錯誤設定判斷非同步回傳期間的錯誤行為，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError> event is raised when there is a page error during asynchronous postbacks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError>非同步回傳期間頁面錯誤時，會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: How errors on the server are sent to the client depends on the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A> property, and the custom errors section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器上的錯誤傳送給用戶端的方式取決於<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A>屬性，並在 Web.config 檔案的自訂錯誤區段。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when there is a page error during an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: 於非同步回傳期間發生頁面錯誤時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError> event is raised when there is a page error during asynchronous postbacks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError>非同步回傳期間頁面錯誤時，會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: How errors on the server are sent to the client depends on the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A> property, and the custom errors section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器上的錯誤傳送給用戶端的方式取決於<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A>屬性，並在 Web.config 檔案的自訂錯誤區段。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError> event to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A> property (which is sent to the client) to the server exception error message.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何處理<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError>事件設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A>伺服器例外狀況的錯誤訊息的屬性 （其中會傳送到用戶端）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message that is sent to the client when an unhandled server exception occurs during an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定錯誤訊息，在非同步回傳期間發生未處理的伺服器例外狀況時，會將該錯誤訊息傳送至用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The error message.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError> event is raised when there is a page error during asynchronous postbacks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError>非同步回傳期間頁面錯誤時，會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: How errors on the server are sent to the client depends on the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A> property, and the custom errors section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器上的錯誤傳送給用戶端的方式取決於<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A>屬性，並在 Web.config 檔案的自訂錯誤區段。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError> event to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A> property (which is sent to the client) to the server exception error message.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何處理<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError>事件設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A>伺服器例外狀況的錯誤訊息的屬性 （其中會傳送到用戶端）。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique ID of the control that caused the asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: 取得導致非同步回傳之控制項的唯一 ID。

trans-unit.source: The unique ID of a control, if the control has an ID; otherwise, an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項具有 ID，則為控制項的唯一 ID，否則為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackSourceElementID%2A> property contains the value of the control ID that caused the asynchronous postback, which can be one of the following:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackSourceElementID%2A>屬性包含導致非同步回傳，它可以是下列其中一種控制項 ID 的值：

trans-unit.source: A postback from a control that is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A> property is set to `true` (the default).
trans-unit.target: 從內部的控制項回傳<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A>屬性設定為`true`（預設值）。

trans-unit.source: A postback from a control that is a trigger for an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 從觸發程序的控制項回傳<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A postback from a control that is registered by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫已註冊的控制項回傳<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the time, in seconds, before asynchronous postbacks time out if no response is received.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，該值表示未收到任何回應時非同步回傳逾時之前的時間 (秒)。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the time-out in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示逾時 (秒)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 90 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 90 秒。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得關聯到目前之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager" /> 執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager" /> object for the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager" /> 執行實體的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager> object that is returned by this property represents the authentication service that is registered with the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager>物件，這個屬性就會傳回代表已向頁面驗證服務。

trans-unit.source: The authentication service can be defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control or in an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> control.
trans-unit.target: 驗證服務可以在定義<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項或在相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can use the ASP.NET authentication service or use a custom authentication service.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ASP.NET 驗證服務，或使用自訂驗證服務。

trans-unit.source: You can add the custom service in markup by including an `AuthenticationService` element inside the `asp:ScriptManager` element on the page, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以包括在標記中加入自訂服務`AuthenticationService`元素內`asp:ScriptManager`元素在頁面上，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically configure the <xref:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以也以程式設計方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.AuthenticationServiceManager>物件。

trans-unit.source: Services are registered with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control during the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> life-cycle stage.
trans-unit.target: 服務會向<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>期間網頁的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>生命週期階段。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method that handles the [Sys.Application.navigate](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79ac04af-18b4-4106-9ab7-9cb10fbd0b93) event on the client.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定方法的名稱，該方法會處理用戶端上的 [Sys.Application.navigate](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79ac04af-18b4-4106-9ab7-9cb10fbd0b93) 事件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method that handles the [Sys.Application.navigate](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79ac04af-18b4-4106-9ab7-9cb10fbd0b93) event on the client.
trans-unit.target: 處理的方法名稱[Sys.Application.navigate](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79ac04af-18b4-4106-9ab7-9cb10fbd0b93)用戶端上的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the composite script that supports the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 取得支援網頁之複合指令碼的參考。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the composite script.
trans-unit.target: 複合指令碼的參考。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Combining Client Scripts into a Composite Script](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d0f608d0-b4c8-4795-990b-ede68c1239b3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[組合到複合指令碼中的用戶端指令碼](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d0f608d0-b4c8-4795-990b-ede68c1239b3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a URL to a blank Web page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定空白網頁的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to use if the target Web page is empty.
trans-unit.target: 要在目標網頁為空白時使用的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EmptyPageUrl%2A> property supports Ajax browser history.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EmptyPageUrl%2A>屬性支援 Ajax 瀏覽器歷程記錄。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current page loads client script references from CDN (Content Delivery Network) paths.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前網頁是否從內容提供網路 (Content Delivery Network，CDN) 路徑載入用戶端指令碼參考。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if client script references are loaded from CDN paths, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端指令碼參考是從 CDN 路徑載入，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Do not set this property to `true` if you set <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.LoadScriptsBeforeUI%2A> to `true` already.
trans-unit.target: 未設定這個屬性為`true`如果您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.LoadScriptsBeforeUI%2A>至`true`已經。

trans-unit.source: Enables local copy of a script to load in the event that the CDN (Content Delivery Network) is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 可讓指令碼的本機複本在發生 CDN (內容傳遞網路) 無法使用的事件時載入。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the fallback CDN value is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如有啟用後援 CDN 值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the Web page supports history point management.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，該值指出網頁否支援記錄點管理。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the Web page supports adding history points to the browser's history stack; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果網頁支援將記錄點加入瀏覽器的記錄堆疊，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableHistory%2A> property to enable history management in a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableHistory%2A>屬性來啟用記錄管理在網頁中的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether public static page methods in an ASP.NET page can be called from client script.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，該值表示是否可以從用戶端指令碼呼叫 ASP.NET 網頁中的公用靜態網頁方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if static page methods on an ASP.NET page can be called from client script as Web methods; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以從用戶端指令碼將 ASP.NET 網頁上的靜態網頁方法呼叫為 Web 方法，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can add static page methods to an ASP.NET page and mark them as Web methods.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將靜態網頁方法加入至 ASP.NET 網頁，並將它們標示為 Web 方法。

trans-unit.source: You can then call these methods from script as if they were part of a Web service, but without creating a separate .asmx file.
trans-unit.target: 然後您可以從指令碼呼叫這些方法，就如同 Web 服務，但是沒有建立個別的.asmx 檔案的一部分。

trans-unit.source: To create Web methods on a page, import the <xref:System.Web.Services> namespace and add a <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute> attribute to each static method that you want to expose.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立在頁面上的 Web 方法，匯入<xref:System.Web.Services>命名空間和新增<xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute>屬性設定為每個您想要公開的靜態方法。

trans-unit.source: The methods must be marked public.
trans-unit.target: 方法必須標記為 public。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Exposing Web Services to Client Script in ASP.NET AJAX](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f6e9e-0acd-44c9-bf0f-0a8598fc13b8).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[公開 Web 服務與 ASP.NET AJAX 中的用戶端指令碼](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f6e9e-0acd-44c9-bf0f-0a8598fc13b8)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables partial rendering of a page, which in turn enables you to update regions of the page individually by using <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，該值會啟用局部網頁呈現，而此功能可讓您使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控制項，個別更新網頁的區域。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if partial rendering is enabled and full-page updates are suppressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如有啟用局部呈現，並停用完整網頁更新，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Even if the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering%2A> property is `true`, partial-page rendering might not occur.
trans-unit.target: 即使<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering%2A>屬性是`true`，在局部網頁呈現可能不會發生。

trans-unit.source: The browser might not support partial-page rendering, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器可能不支援局部網頁呈現或<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.SupportsPartialRendering%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: You can override the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering%2A> property at run time during or before the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫的值<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering%2A>屬性在執行階段期間或之前的頁面<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>事件。

trans-unit.source: If you try to change this property after the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event has occurred, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試變更這個屬性頁之後<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>已發生事件，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering" /> property is set after the page's <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 當網頁的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering" /> 事件發生之後，會設定 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control renders script that supports parsing and formatting of culture-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，該值表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控制項呈現的指令碼，是否支援格式化和剖析文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if culture-specific information can be displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以顯示文化特性資訊，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptGlobalization%2A> property is set to `true`, globalized ECMAScript (JavaScript) functions such as the method display culture-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptGlobalization%2A>屬性設定為`true`，全球化的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 函數，例如，方法會顯示特定文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The culture can be set in the browser, in server code, or in the Web site's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器、 伺服端程式碼，或在網站的組態檔中，可以設定文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control renders localized versions of script files.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，該值表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控制項是否呈現當地語系化版本的指令碼檔。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if localized script files will be rendered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果將呈現當地語系化的指令碼檔，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptLocalization%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> object will retrieve script files for the current culture if they exist.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptLocalization%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>物件將會擷取目前的文化特性的指令碼檔案，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: For example, a page might specify a script file that is named CustomScript.js.
trans-unit.target: 例如，頁面可能會指定名為 CustomScript.js 的指令碼檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the culture is set to fr-CA, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> object will try to retrieve a script file that is named CustomScript.fr-CA.js.
trans-unit.target: 如果文化特性設定為 FR-CA<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>物件將會嘗試擷取名為 CustomScript.fr CA.js 指令碼檔。

trans-unit.source: To prevent a script file from being rendered two times, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptLocalization%2A> property must not be modified during an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止指令碼檔案所呈現兩次，<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableScriptLocalization%2A>非同步回傳期間不得修改屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to encrypt the history state string.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，該值指出是否要將記錄狀態字串加密。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the history state string should be encrypted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果記錄狀態字串應該加密，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This property should ***never*** be set to `false` on a production web site.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性應該***從未***設`false`生產網站上。

trans-unit.source: The page instance to retrieve the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> from.
trans-unit.target: 擷取對象 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 所在的網頁執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> instance for a given <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> instance for the selected <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> object, or <see langword="null" /> if no instance is defined.
trans-unit.target: 所選 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 物件目前的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 執行個體；如果未定義任何執行個體，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this static method to determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control is on a page, or to access the properties and methods of a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control when you do not know its ID.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個靜態方法來判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項是在頁面上，或若要存取的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制當您不知道它的 id。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="page" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="page" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a read-only collection of ECMAScript (JavaScript) array declarations that were previously registered with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 陣列宣告的唯讀集合，該陣列宣告先前是向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 物件註冊。

trans-unit.source: A generic collection that contains the array declarations.
trans-unit.target: 包含陣列宣告的泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a read-only collection of client script blocks that were previously registered with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 擷取用戶端指令碼區塊的唯讀集合，該區塊先前是向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控制項註冊。

trans-unit.source: A generic collection that contains client script blocks.
trans-unit.target: 包含用戶端指令碼區塊的泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: Client script blocks are registered with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control for use with a control that is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端指令碼區塊會向<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>內部的控制項一起使用控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a read-only collection of <see langword="dispose" /> scripts that were previously registered with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 <see langword="dispose" /> 指令碼的唯讀集合，該指令碼先前是向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 物件註冊。

trans-unit.source: A generic collection that contains <see langword="dispose" /> scripts.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see langword="dispose" /> 指令碼的泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: A `dispose` script executes when the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control is updated or deleted.
trans-unit.target: A`dispose`指令碼時執行<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>更新或刪除控制項。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a read-only collection of custom (expando) attributes that were previously registered with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取自訂 (expando) 屬性的唯讀集合，該屬性先前是向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 物件註冊。

trans-unit.source: A generic collection that contains custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: 包含自訂屬性的泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: A custom attribute is a name/value pair that can be read and set by client script.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性是名稱/值組，可以讀取及設定用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a read-only collection of hidden fields that were previously registered with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取隱藏欄位的唯讀集合，該欄位先前是向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 物件註冊。

trans-unit.source: A generic collection that contains hidden fields.
trans-unit.target: 包含隱藏欄位的泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a read-only collection of <see langword="onsubmit" /> statements that were previously registered with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 <see langword="onsubmit" /> 陳述式的唯讀集合，該陳述式先前是向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 物件註冊。

trans-unit.source: A generic collection that contains <see langword="onsubmit" /> statements.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see langword="onsubmit" /> 陳述式的泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: An `onsubmit` statement is ECMAScript (JavaScript) that is executed when the form is submitted.
trans-unit.target: `onsubmit`陳述式是在送出表單時所執行的 ECMAScript (JavaScript)。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a read-only collection of startup scripts that were previously registered with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取啟始指令碼的唯讀集合，指令碼先前是向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 物件註冊。

trans-unit.source: A generic collection that contains startup scripts.
trans-unit.target: 包含啟始指令碼的泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: A startup script is client script that is associated with a control that executes when the control is started.
trans-unit.target: 啟動指令碼會執行啟動控制項時的控制項相關聯的用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a string that contains key/value pairs that represent the state of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 擷取字串，該字串內含代表網頁狀態的索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the key/value pairs that represent the state of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 包含索引鍵/值組的字串，代表網頁的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the debug versions of client script libraries will be rendered.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，該值指出是否要呈現用戶端指令碼程式庫的偵錯版本。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current request is executing in debug mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的要求正以偵錯模式執行，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.IsDebuggingEnabled%2A> property returns `false` when any one of the following conditions is true:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.IsDebuggingEnabled%2A>屬性會傳回`false`任一下列條件為 true 時：

trans-unit.source: In the element of the configuration file, the `retail` attribute is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 組態檔中，項目中`retail`屬性設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: This overrides all other settings.
trans-unit.target: 這會覆寫所有其他設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A> property is set to `Auto` or to `Inherit`, and debugging is not enabled in the `compilation` section of the application-root Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A>屬性設定為`Auto`或`Inherit`，而且在不啟用偵錯`compilation`應用程式根目錄 Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A> property is set to `Release`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A> 屬性設定為 `Release`。

trans-unit.source: The `debug` attribute of the directive does not affect Ajax-enabled ASP.NET applications.
trans-unit.target: `debug`指示詞屬性不會影響已啟用 Ajax 的 ASP.NET 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control uses only the settings in the Web.config file and in its <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.IsDebuggingEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A> properties to determine whether to render debug scripts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項使用只有設定 Web.config 檔案中，然後在其<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.IsDebuggingEnabled%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A>屬性，以決定是否要呈現偵錯指令碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Debugging and Tracing Ajax Applications Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/92684ea0-7bb4-4a34-9203-3aa6394ce375).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[偵錯和追蹤 Ajax 應用程式概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/92684ea0-7bb4-4a34-9203-3aa6394ce375)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current postback is being executed in partial-rendering mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，該值會指出目前的回傳是否正以局部呈現模式執行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current postback is executing in partial-rendering mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的回傳正以局部呈現模式執行，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.IsInAsyncPostBack%2A> property in combination with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A> property to distinguish between the initial page load, a partial-page update, and a full-page update in <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.InitComplete>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> events.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.IsInAsyncPostBack%2A>屬性結合<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A>屬性來區別之間的初始頁面負載、 局部網頁更新和中的停用完整網頁更新<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.InitComplete>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Navigate" /> event is currently being handled.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，該值指示是否正在處理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Navigate" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Navigate" /> is being handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在處理 <see langword="true" />，則為 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Navigate" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.IsNavigating%2A> property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Navigate> event has been raised.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.IsNavigating%2A>屬性來判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Navigate>在引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的索引鍵識別項。

trans-unit.source: The collection of all the incoming post data.
trans-unit.target: 所有傳入之張貼資料的集合。

trans-unit.source: Reads form data that is posted from the browser to the server, and determines the source of the asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: 讀取從瀏覽器張貼至伺服器的表單資料，並決定非同步回傳的來源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control's state has changed as a result of a postback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果回傳的結果改變了 <see langword="true" /> 控制項的狀態，則為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.LoadPostData%2A> method is primarily used by control developers to extend the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.LoadPostData%2A>方法主要由控制項開發人員用來擴充功能的<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether scripts are loaded before or after markup for the page UI is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，該值表示指令碼是在載入網頁 UI 的標記之前或之後載入。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if scripts are loaded before markup for the UI is loaded; <see langword="false" /> if scripts are loaded after markup for the UI is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果在載入 UI 的標記之前載入指令碼，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果在載入 UI 的標記之後載入指令碼，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.LoadScriptsBeforeUI%2A> property determines how scripts in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A> collection are loaded relative to the markup for the page UI.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.LoadScriptsBeforeUI%2A>屬性會決定如何在指令碼<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A>相對於網頁 UI 的標記會載入集合。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.LoadScriptsBeforeUI%2A> property is `true`, a `script` element is rendered before the page's UI markup is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.LoadScriptsBeforeUI%2A>屬性是`true`、`script`項目會呈現在載入網頁的 UI 的標記之前。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, if UI elements are defined in scripts, the UI will be fully functional when it loads.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，UI 項目所定義的指令碼中 UI 會正常載入時。

trans-unit.source: However, if the script accesses UI elements in the markup for which instances have not yet been created, an error might occur.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果指令碼存取的執行個體有尚未建立在標記中的 UI 項目，就可能會發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: To make sure that UI elements are loaded before you access them, handle the event of the class.
trans-unit.target: 若要確定 UI 項目會載入前存取它們，處理之事件的類別。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.LoadScriptsBeforeUI%2A> property is `false`, a `script` element is rendered after the page's UI markup is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.LoadScriptsBeforeUI%2A>屬性是`false`、`script`項目會呈現在呈現網頁的 UI 標記之後。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the UI loads more quickly, but it might not be fully functional if scripts that define additional UI elements have not finished loading.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，UI 載入速度更快，但它可能無法完全正常運作如果定義其他 UI 項目的指令碼尚未完成載入。

trans-unit.source: Do not set this property to `true` if you set <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableCdn%2A> to `true` already.
trans-unit.target: 未設定這個屬性為`true`如果您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableCdn%2A>至`true`已經。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the browser's **Back** or **Forward** button.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下瀏覽器的 [上一頁] 或 [下一頁] 按鈕時發生。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the browser's **Back** button, the browser navigates through previously-viewed URLs, which can include URLs that contain history-point state data.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下瀏覽器的**回** 按鈕，瀏覽器巡覽先前檢視過的 Url，可以包含具有記錄點狀態資料的 Url。

trans-unit.source: If client code in the Web page detects that the URL contains history state data, it makes a request to the server page.
trans-unit.target: 如果在網頁中的用戶端程式碼偵測到此 URL 包含記錄狀態資料，而進行要求 [伺服器] 頁面。

trans-unit.source: This acts as a postback event, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> server control raises the `Navigate` event.
trans-unit.target: 這可以做為回傳事件，而<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>伺服器控制項引發`Navigate`事件。

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event and re-create the page as required in the Web application by using the state data that is passed with the event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理這個事件，並重新建立使用傳遞的狀態資料與事件的 視需要在 Web 應用程式頁面。

trans-unit.source: The error event data.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError> event is raised when there is a page error during asynchronous postbacks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError>非同步回傳期間頁面錯誤時，會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: How errors on the server are sent to the client depends on the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A> property, and the custom errors section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器上的錯誤傳送給用戶端的方式取決於<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AllowCustomErrorsRedirect%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A>屬性，並在 Web.config 檔案的自訂錯誤區段。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError> event to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A> property (which is sent to the client) to the server exception error message.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何處理<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackError>事件設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.AsyncPostBackErrorMessage%2A>伺服器例外狀況的錯誤訊息的屬性 （其中會傳送到用戶端）。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event and makes sure that only one <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control exists on the page.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> 事件，並確保頁面上只有一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: More than one instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> exists on the page.
trans-unit.target: 網頁上存在多個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method, call the base <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that script files are correctly handled for partial-page rendering.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫這個方法，呼叫基底<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" />局部網頁呈現為能正確地處理方法，使之指令碼檔案。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event, and registers script files and services for partial-page updates.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> 事件，並註冊指令碼檔和服務，以進行局部網頁更新。

trans-unit.source: For information about the DOM, see the [Document Object Model (DOM) Level 1 Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73305) on the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site.
trans-unit.target: DOM 的詳細資訊，請參閱[文件物件模型 (DOM) 層級 1 規格](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73305)World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站上。

trans-unit.source: The browser that made the partial-page request does not support at least DOM Level 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 發出部分網頁要求的瀏覽器不支援 DOM 層級 1.0 以上。

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method, call the base <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that script blocks and services are correctly handled for partial-page rendering.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫這個方法，呼叫基底<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" />局部網頁呈現為能正確地處理方法，使之指令碼區塊和服務。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the composite script reference.
trans-unit.target: 物件，代表複合指令碼參考。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveCompositeScriptReference" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveCompositeScriptReference" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the current script.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前指令碼的物件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference" /> event for each script reference that is managed by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 針對 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference" /> 控制項管理的每個指令碼參考，引發 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.OnPreRender%2A> event handler, one time for each <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.OnPreRender%2A>事件處理常式，一次<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>中<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference> event is raised after duplicate script entries have been resolved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference>複製指令碼項目已解決之後，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to affect the behaviors of individual script blocks on postback or during partial-page updates.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法會影響個別的指令碼區塊在回傳時或在局部網頁更新期間的行為。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得關聯到目前之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager" /> 執行個體的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager" /> object for the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager" /> 執行實體的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager> object that is returned by this property represents the profile service that is registered with the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager>這個屬性所傳回的物件都代表與網頁註冊設定檔服務。

trans-unit.source: The profile service can be defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control or in an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> control.
trans-unit.target: 可以在定義設定檔服務<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項或在相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can use the ASP.NET profile service or use a custom profile service.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ASP.NET 設定檔服務，或使用自訂設定檔服務。

trans-unit.source: You can add the custom service in markup by including a `ProfileService` element inside the `asp:ScriptManager` element on the page, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以包括在標記中加入自訂服務`ProfileService`元素內`asp:ScriptManager`元素在頁面上，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically configure the <xref:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以也以程式設計方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.ProfileServiceManager>物件。

trans-unit.source: Services are registered with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control during the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> life-cycle stage.
trans-unit.target: 服務會向<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>期間網頁的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>生命週期階段。

trans-unit.source: A string of key/value pairs that represent the history state of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵/值組字串，代表網頁的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Processes a postback event raised by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control and loads the history state of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 處理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控制項所引發的回傳事件，並載入網頁的記錄狀態。

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 回傳至伺服器時，便會引發 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控制項的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method is primarily used by control developers to extend the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>方法主要由控制項開發人員用來擴充功能的<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control, no events are raised.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項，不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Registers an ECMAScript (JavaScript) array declaration with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control for use with a control that is inside an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control, and adds the array to the page.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控制項註冊 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 陣列宣告，以配合 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控制項內部的控制項一起使用，並將陣列加入至網頁中。

trans-unit.source: The control that is registering the array.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊陣列的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The name of the array to register.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊的陣列名稱。

trans-unit.source: The array value or values to register.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊的一或多個陣列值。

trans-unit.source: Registers an ECMAScript (JavaScript) array declaration with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control for use with a control that is inside an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control, and adds the array to the page.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控制項註冊 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 陣列宣告，以配合 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控制項內部的控制項一起使用，並將陣列加入至網頁中。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A> method to register a client script array that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A>方法，登錄具有局部網頁呈現，且相容的用戶端指令碼陣列之中未包含任何[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]相依性。

trans-unit.source: This method registers the array when `control` represents a control that is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control that is being updated.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會註冊陣列時`control`代表內部的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>正在更新的控制項。

trans-unit.source: To register an array every time that an asynchronous postback occurs, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%28System.Web.UI.Page%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> overload of this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊陣列的每次非同步回傳發生時，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%28System.Web.UI.Page%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>這個方法多載。
