trans-unit.source: If you want to register an array that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the array only one time during initial page rendering, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要註冊陣列，不屬於局部網頁更新，而且如果您想要註冊陣列的初始頁面在呈現期間，一次使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can get a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A> property of the page.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得的參考<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>物件從<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A>頁的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A> method determines whether an array with the name that is specified in the `arrayName` parameter is already registered.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A>方法會判斷是否具有名稱中指定的陣列`arrayName`參數已經註冊過了。

trans-unit.source: If so, the method adds the values specified in `arrayValue`.
trans-unit.target: 因此，方法會將指定的值如果`arrayValue`。

trans-unit.source: Because the array to be registered is based on the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> class, duplicates are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 因為要註冊陣列以基礎<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>類別，允許重複的項目。

trans-unit.source: If a registered array with the name in `arrayName` does not exist, the array is created and the values in `arrayValue` are added to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果已註冊的陣列中的名稱與`arrayName`不存在，在建立陣列及其包含的值`arrayValue`加入其中。

trans-unit.source: To include string literals in the array, use single quotation marks (') or escaped double quotation marks (\\") in `arrayValue`.
trans-unit.target: 若要包含在陣列中的字串常值，使用單引號 （'） 或逸出雙引號內 (\\") 中`arrayValue`。

trans-unit.source: Note that JavaScript treats a comma (,) as a delimiter in an array.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，JavaScript 會將逗號 （，） 做為陣列中的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: You can specify multiple array values by passing a comma-delimited string in `arrayValue`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由傳遞以逗號分隔的字串中指定多個陣列值`arrayValue`。

trans-unit.source: Separating two items with a comma in `arrayValue` is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A> method two times, one time for each item.
trans-unit.target: 以逗號分隔兩個項目`arrayValue`就相當於呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A>方法兩次，一次，每個項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="arrayName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arrayName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The page object that is registering the array.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊陣列的頁面物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the array to register.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊的陣列名稱。

trans-unit.source: The array value or values to register.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊的一或多個陣列值。

trans-unit.source: Registers an ECMAScript (JavaScript) array declaration with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control for use with a control that is inside an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control, and adds the array to the page.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控制項註冊 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 陣列宣告，以配合 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控制項內部的控制項一起使用，並將陣列加入至網頁中。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A> method to register a client script array that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A>方法，登錄具有局部網頁呈現，且相容的用戶端指令碼陣列之中未包含任何[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]相依性。

trans-unit.source: This method registers the array every time that an asynchronous postback occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會註冊每次非同步回傳發生時的陣列。

trans-unit.source: To register an array for a control that is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control so that the array is registered only when the panel is updated, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%28System.Web.UI.Control%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> overload of this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊的陣列，內部的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項，以便只在更新面板時註冊的陣列，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%28System.Web.UI.Control%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>這個方法多載。

trans-unit.source: If you want to register an array that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the array only one time during initial page rendering, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要註冊陣列，不屬於局部網頁更新，而且如果您想要註冊陣列的初始頁面在呈現期間，一次使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can get a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A> property of the page.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得的參考<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>物件從<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A>頁的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="arrayName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arrayName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The control to register for asynchronous postbacks.
trans-unit.target: 為執行非同步回傳而註冊的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Registers a control as a trigger for asynchronous postbacks.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項註冊為非同步回傳的觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A> method enables you to register Web server controls as triggers so that they perform an asynchronous postback instead of a synchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A>方法可讓您將 Web 伺服器控制項登錄為觸發程序，使他們執行非同步回傳而不是同步回傳。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A> property of an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control is set to `true` (which is the default), postback controls inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control are automatically registered as asynchronous postback controls.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制設為 `true` （此為預設值），回傳控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項就會自動註冊為非同步回傳的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A> method to register controls outside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control as triggers for asynchronous postbacks, and to potentially update the content of an update panel.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A>方法，登錄之外的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>為觸發程序的非同步回傳，並可能會更新更新面板的內容控制項。

trans-unit.source: To update an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control programmatically, call the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Update%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要更新<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>以程式設計方式控制，請呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Update%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can add the trigger declaratively by using the `Triggers` element of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以新增觸發程序以宣告方式使用`Triggers`元素<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, use the designer's **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Studio 中，使用設計工具的**UpdatePanelTrigger 集合編輯器** 對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A> method to register a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control so that it causes an update of an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control's content.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A>方法，登錄<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控制，讓它導致更新<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項的內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control is not inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控制項不是內部<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Two buttons are shown: `Button1` and `Button2`.
trans-unit.target: 會顯示兩個按鈕：`Button1`和`Button2`。

trans-unit.source: `Button1` refreshes the content of the panel, and `Button2` refreshes the whole page.
trans-unit.target: `Button1` 重新整理面板的內容和`Button2`重新整理整頁。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A> method to register a user control so that it causes an update of an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control's content.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A>方法，登錄使用者控制項，以便它會導致更新<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項的內容。

trans-unit.source: The first example shows a page using the user control.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例顯示使用使用者控制項的網頁。

trans-unit.source: The second example shows the user control.
trans-unit.target: 第二個範例顯示的使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="control" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The registered control does not implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer" />, <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler" />, or <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler" /> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 所註冊的控制項並不實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer" />, <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: Registers a client script block with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control for use with a control that is inside an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control, and then adds the script block to the page.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控制項註冊用戶端指令碼區塊，以配合 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控制項內部的控制項一起使用，並將指令碼區塊加入網頁中。

trans-unit.source: The control that is registering the client script block.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊用戶端指令碼區塊的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The type of the client script block.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端指令碼區塊的類型。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is usually specified by using the <see langword="typeof" /> operator (C#) or the <see langword="GetType" /> operator (Visual Basic) to retrieve the type of the control that is registering the script.
trans-unit.target: 此參數通常會透過 <see langword="typeof" /> 運算子 (C#) 或 <see langword="GetType" /> 運算子 (Visual Basic) 指定，用以擷取註冊指令碼的控制項類型。

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the script block.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼區塊的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: The script.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enclose the script block in <see langword="<script>" /> and <see langword="</script>" /> tags; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要將指令碼區塊含括在 <see langword="true" /> 和 <see langword="<script>" /> 標記中，則為 <see langword="</script>" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Registers a client script block with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control for use with a control that is inside an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control, and then adds the script block to the page.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控制項註冊用戶端指令碼區塊，以配合 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控制項內部的控制項一起使用，並將指令碼區塊加入網頁中。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A> method to register a client script block that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>註冊具有局部網頁呈現，且相容的用戶端指令碼區塊的方法沒有任何[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]相依性。

trans-unit.source: Client script blocks that are registered by using this method are sent to the page only when `control` represents a control that is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control that is being updated.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法註冊的用戶端指令碼區塊會傳送至網頁時，才`control`代表內部的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>正在更新的控制項。

trans-unit.source: To register a script block every time that an asynchronous postback occurs, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%28System.Web.UI.Page%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload of this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊指令碼區塊每次非同步回傳發生時，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%28System.Web.UI.Page%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>這個方法多載。

trans-unit.source: If you want to register a script block that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the script block only one time during initial page rendering, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要註冊指令碼區塊，不屬於局部網頁更新，而且如果您想要註冊指令碼區塊一次只能在初始網頁呈現期間使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can get a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A> property of the page.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得的參考<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>物件從<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A>頁的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If `addScriptTags` is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A> method adds `<script>` tags around the script block.
trans-unit.target: 如果`addScriptTags`是`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>方法會將`<script>`周圍的指令碼區塊的標籤。

trans-unit.source: Pass `false` if you want to create `<script>` tags yourself, such as when you want to set the attributes of specific `<script>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞`false`如果您想要建立`<script>`標籤，例如當您想要設定的特定屬性`<script>`標記。

trans-unit.source: If `addScriptTags` is `false` and the `script` parameter contains multiple script blocks, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`addScriptTags`是`false`和`script`參數包含多個指令碼區塊，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A> method adds a script block to the page after the opening `<form>` tag.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>方法將頁面加入指令碼區塊，在開啟之後`<form>`標記。

trans-unit.source: The script blocks are not guaranteed to be output in the same order in which they are registered.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼區塊不保證其所註冊的順序相同的輸出。

trans-unit.source: If the order of the script blocks is important, concatenate your script blocks into a single string (for example, by using the <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> object), and then register them as a single client script block.
trans-unit.target: 如果指令碼區塊的順序很重要，將指令碼區塊串連成單一字串 (例如，藉由使用<xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>物件)，然後做為單一用戶端指令碼區塊加以註冊。

trans-unit.source: The client script block <paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Registers a client script block with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control for use with a control that is inside an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control, and then adds the script block to the page.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控制項註冊用戶端指令碼區塊，以配合 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控制項內部的控制項一起使用，並將指令碼區塊加入網頁中。

trans-unit.source: When you register a script block by using this method, the script is rendered every time that an asynchronous postback occurs.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用此方法註冊的指令碼區塊時，則指令碼會轉譯每次非同步回傳發生時。

trans-unit.source: To register a script block for a control that is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control so that script is registered only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control is updated, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%28System.Web.UI.Control%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload of this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊指令碼區塊的內部的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項，以便在註冊指令碼時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項更新，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%28System.Web.UI.Control%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>這個方法多載。

trans-unit.source: If you want to register a script block that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the script block only one time during initial page rendering, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要註冊指令碼區塊，不屬於局部網頁更新，而且如果您想要註冊指令碼區塊一次只能在初始網頁呈現期間使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can get a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A> property of the page.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得的參考<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>物件從<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A>頁的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptInclude%2A> method to register a client script file for a page or part of a page that is participating in partial-page updates.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptInclude%2A> method registers a client script file on the page by rendering a `script` element whose opening tag contains a `src` attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptInclude%2A>方法註冊用戶端指令碼檔案，頁面上的所呈現`script`其開頭的標記包含的項目`src`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `url` parameter is used to set the `src` attribute.
trans-unit.target: `url`參數用來設定`src`屬性。

trans-unit.source: To resolve URLs, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveClientUrl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要解決的 Url，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveClientUrl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the context of the URL it is called for to resolve the path.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用針對呼叫解析路徑的 URL 的內容。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptInclude%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptResource%2A> methods render script files to the browser.

trans-unit.source: Registers a client script file that is embedded in an assembly with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control every time that a postback occurs.
trans-unit.target: 每次發生回傳時，使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控制項註冊內嵌在組件中的用戶端指令碼檔。

trans-unit.source: When you register a script file with this method, the script is rendered every time that an asynchronous postback occurs.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用此方法註冊的指令碼檔案時，指令碼會轉譯每次非同步回傳發生時。

trans-unit.source: To register a script for a control that is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control so that the script is registered only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control is updated, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptResource%28System.Web.UI.Control%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%29> overload of this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊的指令碼位於控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制，好讓註冊的指令碼時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項更新，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptResource%28System.Web.UI.Control%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%29>這個方法多載。

trans-unit.source: If you want to register a script block that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the script block only one time during initial page rendering, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要註冊指令碼區塊，不屬於局部網頁更新，而且如果您想要註冊指令碼區塊一次只能在初始網頁呈現期間使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can get a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A> property of the page.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得的參考<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>物件從<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientScript%2A>頁的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The client resource <paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端資源 <paramref name="type" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

The page that is registering the script is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 正在註冊指令碼的網頁為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends custom data to controls during partial-page rendering.
trans-unit.target: 在局部網頁呈現期間，將自訂資料傳送給控制項。

trans-unit.source: The control that is receiving the data.
trans-unit.target: 要接收資料的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The data that is sent to the control.
trans-unit.target: 傳送給控制項的資料。

trans-unit.source: Sends custom data to a control during partial-page rendering.
trans-unit.target: 在局部網頁呈現期間，將自訂資料傳送給控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A> method to send data from the server to the client during asynchronous postbacks, regardless of whether the control receiving the data is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A>方法，以從伺服器傳送資料至用戶端非同步回傳，不論是否接收資料的控制項位於<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A> method can be called only during an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A>只能在非同步回傳期間呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a postback is asynchronous, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.IsInAsyncPostBack%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否為非同步回傳，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.IsInAsyncPostBack%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the overload that takes a parameter named `isJsonSerialized` that is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用接受名為參數的多載`isJsonSerialized`設為`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `isJsonSerialized` parameter is set to `false`, the string is not serialized as JavaScript Object Notation (JSON).
trans-unit.target: 當`isJsonSerialized`參數設定為`false`，字串不會序列化為 JavaScript 物件標記法 (JSON)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the JSON format, see the [Introducing JSON](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=77297) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需 JSON 格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[JSON 簡介](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=77297)網站。

trans-unit.source: The data items that are registered with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A> method can be accessed in client script during the , , and events of the object.
trans-unit.target: 包含已註冊的資料項目<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A>方法可以存取期間的用戶端指令碼、 和物件的事件。

trans-unit.source: When you handle these events, the custom data is passed in an event argument object.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理這些事件時，事件引數物件中傳遞自訂資料。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you provide a handler for the event, the custom data is passed in the class, which exposes a property.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您提供的事件處理常式，則會傳遞自訂資料在類別中，會公開屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to send data to two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controls on a page during an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何將資料傳送至兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>非同步回傳期間的頁面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controls are not inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制項不是內部<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The data that is sent in this example is for illustration only.
trans-unit.target: 此範例中傳送的資料是僅供說明。

trans-unit.source: In a real-world application, you would use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A> method to send custom data from the server.
trans-unit.target: 在真實世界的應用程式，您會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A>方法，以從伺服器傳送自訂資料。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem(System.Web.UI.Control,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> 方法會在回傳期間呼叫。

trans-unit.target: 已為 <paramref name="dataItem" /> 註冊 <paramref name="control" />。

trans-unit.source: The page control that is receiving the data.
trans-unit.target: 要接收資料的網頁控制項。

trans-unit.source: The data that is sent to the control.
trans-unit.target: 傳送給控制項的資料。

trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示 <c>dataItem</c> 已序列化為 JSON；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends custom data to a control during partial-page rendering, and indicates whether the data is in JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) format.
trans-unit.target: 在局部網頁呈現期間，將自訂資料傳送給控制項，並指出資料是否為「JavaScript 物件標記法」(JSON) 格式。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A> method to send data from the server to the client during asynchronous postbacks, regardless of whether the control receiving the data is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A>方法，以從伺服器傳送資料至用戶端非同步回傳，不論是否接收資料的控制項位於<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the `dataItem` parameter that you register for `control` is not serialized as JSON, set the `isJsonSerialized` parameter to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`dataItem`您註冊的參數`control`不會序列化為 JSON，設定`isJsonSerialized`參數`false`。

trans-unit.source: This avoids the need to use the function for each string that is sent to the client.
trans-unit.target: 這樣可避免使用函數，針對每個傳送到用戶端的字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the JSON format, see the [Introducing JSON](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=77297) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需 JSON 格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[JSON 簡介](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=77297)網站。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A> method can be called only during an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A>只能在非同步回傳期間呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a postback is asynchronous, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.IsInAsyncPostBack%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否為非同步回傳，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.IsInAsyncPostBack%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The data items that are registered by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A> method can be accessed in client script during the , , and events of the object.
trans-unit.target: 使用註冊資料項目<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A>方法可以存取期間的用戶端指令碼處理、 和物件的事件。

trans-unit.source: When you handle these events, the custom data is passed in an event argument object.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理這些事件時，事件引數物件中傳遞自訂資料。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you provide a handler for the event, the custom data is passed in the class, which exposes a property.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您提供的事件處理常式，則會傳遞自訂資料在類別中，會公開屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to send data to two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controls on a page during an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何將資料傳送至兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>非同步回傳期間的頁面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controls are not inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制項不是內部<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example shows the overload that does not take the `isJsonSerialized` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此範例顯示的多載不接受`isJsonSerialized`參數。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the procedure for retrieving the property of the object is the same as if you did not use that overload.
trans-unit.target: 否則，程序來擷取物件的屬性會是相同，因為如果您未使用該多載。

trans-unit.source: The data that is sent in this example is for illustration only.
trans-unit.target: 此範例中傳送的資料是僅供說明。

trans-unit.source: In a real-world application, you would use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A> method to send custom data from the server.
trans-unit.target: 在真實世界的應用程式，您會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem%2A>方法，以從伺服器傳送自訂資料。

trans-unit.source: For example, you could use the data item to send information about whether to hide or show client elements that are not inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用傳送有關是否要隱藏或顯示用戶端不是內部的項目資訊的資料項目<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="control" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem(System.Web.UI.Control,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> method is called during a postback.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDataItem(System.Web.UI.Control,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> 方法會在回傳期間呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataItem" /> is already registered for <paramref name="control" />.
trans-unit.target: 已為 <paramref name="dataItem" /> 註冊 <paramref name="control" />。

trans-unit.source: The control that the <see langword="dispose" /> script is for.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="dispose" /> 指令碼所屬的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="dispose" /> script.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="dispose" /> 指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Registers a <see langword="dispose" /> script for a control that is inside an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 註冊 <see langword="dispose" /> 控制項內部之控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The script is executed when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control is updated or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 更新或刪除 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控制項時，即會執行該指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDispose%2A> method to register `dispose` scripts for controls that are inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDispose%2A>方法，登錄`dispose`控制項內的指令碼<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: During asynchronous postbacks, <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls can be updated, deleted, or created.
trans-unit.target: 在非同步回傳期間<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項可以進行更新、 刪除，或建立。

trans-unit.source: When a panel is updated or deleted, any `dispose` scripts that are registered for controls that are inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> are called.
trans-unit.target: 當更新或刪除任何面板`dispose`註冊指令碼會在內部的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>稱為。

trans-unit.source: In typical page development scenarios, you do not have to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDispose%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在典型網頁開發的情況下，您不需要呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDispose%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDispose%2A> method is intended for use by control developers to register script or create controls that inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDispose%2A>方法是由控制項開發人員若要註冊指令碼或建立繼承的控制項時用於<xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl>介面。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might use a `dispose` script if you develop a client control by using composition.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能會使用`dispose`編寫指令碼，如果您使用複合開發的用戶端控制項。

trans-unit.source: In your control, you implement <xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> and render individual controls.
trans-unit.target: 在您的控制項，您會實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl>和呈現個別控制項。

trans-unit.source: You register the `dispose` method of any item that does not correspond to a defined client component such as `Sys.TextBox`.
trans-unit.target: 您註冊`dispose`任何的方法項目，並未對應到定義的用戶端元件這類`Sys.TextBox`。

trans-unit.source: If your custom control composes elements that correspond to client components in the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)], you do not have to register a `dispose` script, because `dispose` is called automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的自訂控制項撰寫對應至用戶端元件中的項目[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]，您沒有註冊`dispose`編寫指令碼，因為`dispose`會自動呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDispose%2A> method for client components that are part of the [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] and that have to free resources when a component is no longer used.
trans-unit.target: 因此，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDispose%2A>方法一部分的用戶端元件[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]且無法再使用元件時，釋放資源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDispose%2A> method can be called multiple times for a control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterDispose%2A>方法可以多次呼叫控制項。

trans-unit.source: Multiple scripts are aggregated.
trans-unit.target: 多個指令碼會彙總。

trans-unit.source: The order of disposing scripts matches the order in which the scripts were registered.
trans-unit.target: 處置指令碼的順序必須符合已註冊的指令碼的順序。

trans-unit.source: If you register a `dispose` script for a control that is not in an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您註冊`dispose`指令碼的控制項，不是處於<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項，擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The `dispose` script is called between the and events of the class.
trans-unit.target: `dispose`之間呼叫指令碼的類別和事件。

trans-unit.target: 要註冊 expando 屬性的控制項。

trans-unit.target: 要註冊的自訂屬性名稱。

trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to encode the custom attribute that is being registered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示為所要註冊的自訂屬性編碼，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Registers a name/value pair with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control as a custom (expando) attribute of a specified control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控制項，將名稱/值組註冊為指定之控制項的自訂 (expando) 屬性。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterExpandoAttribute%2A> method to register a custom (expando) property for a control that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterExpandoAttribute%2A>註冊具有局部網頁呈現，且相容的控制項的自訂 (expando) 屬性的方法沒有任何[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]相依性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterExpandoAttribute%2A> method registers a name/value pair as a custom attribute for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterExpandoAttribute%2A>方法註冊為指定之控制項的自訂屬性的名稱/值組。

trans-unit.source: The property is set dynamically from ECMAScript (JavaScript) to preserve XHTML compatibility for the rendered control's markup.
trans-unit.target: 屬性是動態設定從 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 以保留呈現的控制項的標記的 XHTML 相容性。

trans-unit.source: Set `encode` to `true` if you have to escape any characters in the dynamic property's value.
trans-unit.target: 設定`encode`至`true`如果您必須逸出動態屬性的值中的任何字元。

trans-unit.source: If the control to which the dynamic property will be added is not found, a script error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到的動態屬性將加入的控制項，就會發生指令碼錯誤。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="control" /> is not in the page's control tree.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> 不在網頁的控制項樹狀結構中。

<paramref name="controlId" /> is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.target: ASP.NET Ajax 擴充項控制項必須註冊參與局部網頁呈現。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterExtenderControl%2A> method adds the specified extender control to an internal list of extender controls and the target script controls they extend.

trans-unit.source: To register a hidden field every time that an asynchronous postback occurs, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterHiddenField%28System.Web.UI.Page%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> overload of this method.

trans-unit.target: 為搭配表單送出時所執行之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控制項一起使用的控制項，向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控制項註冊 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A> adds script that is executed before the form is submitted, which lets you modify the submission or cancel it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A>新增會提交表單時之前, 執行的指令碼可讓您修改提交或取消它。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A> method to render an `onsubmit` statement that is compatible with partial-page rendering and that has no [!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)] dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A>方法以呈現`onsubmit`陳述式相容於局部網頁呈現，且具有無[!INCLUDE[atlaslib_current_ext](~/includes/atlaslib-current-ext-md.md)]相依性。

trans-unit.source: JavaScript code that is registered by using this method is sent to the page only when the control that is registering the statement is inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control that is being updated.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法註冊的 JavaScript 程式碼傳送至網頁時，才會註冊陳述式的控制項內<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>正在更新的控制項。

trans-unit.source: To register code with every asynchronous postback, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%28System.Web.UI.Page%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> overload of this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要向每次非同步回傳的程式碼，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%28System.Web.UI.Page%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>這個方法多載。

trans-unit.source: If you want to register JavaScript code that does not pertain to partial-page updates, and if you want to register the code only one time during initial page rendering, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要註冊 JavaScript 程式碼，不屬於局部網頁更新，而且如果您想要註冊此程式碼一次只能在初始網頁呈現期間使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>類別。

trans-unit.source: The *script* parameter of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A> method can contain multiple script commands that are delimited by using semicolons (;).
trans-unit.target: *指令碼*參數<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A>方法可以包含多個指令碼命令所使用分號 （;） 分隔。

trans-unit.source: Registering JavaScript code with this method causes the script to be included every time that an asynchronous postback occurs.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法註冊 JavaScript 程式碼，讓指令碼會包含每次非同步回傳發生時。

trans-unit.source: Code from any earlier asynchronous postbacks is not removed.
trans-unit.target: 不會移除任何先前非同步回傳的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: New asynchronous postbacks append code to any existing code for the `onsubmit` statement.
trans-unit.target: 新的非同步回傳附加至現有的程式碼的程式碼`onsubmit`陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Registers a control as a trigger for a postback.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項註冊為回傳的觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to configure postback controls inside an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control that would otherwise perform asynchronous postbacks.
trans-unit.target: 可使用此方法來為另外執行非同步回傳的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控制項設定其內部的回傳控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterPostBackControl%2A> method to register postback controls inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control as triggers.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterPostBackControl%2A>方法，以登錄內部的回傳控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>為觸發程序的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Controls that are registered by using this method update a whole page instead of updating only the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control's content.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法註冊的控制項更新而不是更新僅將整個頁面<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項的內容。

trans-unit.source: Registering a postback control with this method outside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control has no affect because by default these controls do not perform asynchronous postbacks.
trans-unit.target: 向外，此方法註冊回傳的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項沒有任何作用，因為根據預設這些控制項不會執行非同步回傳。

trans-unit.source: You can add the trigger declaratively by using the `Triggers` element of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以新增觸發程序以宣告方式使用`Triggers`元素<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, use the designer's **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Studio 中，使用設計工具的**UpdatePanelTrigger 集合編輯器** 對話方塊。
